### Here you can find more about my academic and professional experience

I am a first-year Master of Science student in the department of Epidemiology at Columbia University's Mailman School of Public Health. I intend to pursue to field of Psychiatric Epidemiology with an emphasis on examining mental health disparities in minority children and adolescents in urban communities. 

I am from Philadelphia, PA but currently live in Washington Heights, NY. In my free time I enjoy traveling to new countries and trying new foods!
